title: Drawing, "Desk", November 10, 1933
medium: Graphite and black ink on tracing paper
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower right: DONALD DESKEY/145 WEST 57TH STREET/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite in stamp, lower right: 7673/F.S./Heeger/11/10/33;
description: Perspective, plan, and elevation drawing for desk. Pedestal support at left with drawer above cabinet door; circular knobs near right. Drawer above kneehole with circular knob at left and horizontal pull near right. Leg at right. Drawer above kneehole extends beyond top surface and leg at right.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Desk", November 10, 1933.
November 10, 1933. Graphite and black ink on tracing paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-824.
